title: JSON schema for elm-package.json configuration files

rangeDependency.description: Dependencies are specified by [author name]/[package name]: [exact version or range]. Range versions look like: [1.0.0 <= v < 2.0.0].

source-directories.description: A list of directories that will be used to build your project.

summary.description: A helpful summary of your package, less than 80 characters

version.description: Your package's version in semantic versioning format.

elm-version.description: The version of elm your package is targeting

exposed-modules.description: All modules that your project will make available to end users.

dependencies.description: A list of elm dependencies that your package needs.
